d91102e790545be0a09c1f715ac4926b (16:22): Like, if you want to use ssh, you have to make sure X11Forwarding is on.
d91102e790545be0a09c1f715ac4926b (16:23): Also, if you want to restart tarantella, unset TERM first so that shell prompts fall back to the lowest common denominator.
